kpi.name: LTE_682a

kpi_info.title: VLAN Intf PHB to send DV lost due CG
kpi_info.use: Total data volume within the Expedited Forwarding PHB class that was dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. The KPI is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN interface of the BTS

kpi.kpi_alias: VLAN Intf PHB to send DV lost due CG
